turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, I would love some coffee. I'm in Seattle, Washington, and I would like to get some coffee at Peet's Coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, which location in seattle?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Is that possible? I'm I'm going to be at 6850 East Green Lake Way North, Seattle, Washington.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say east greenlight?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: East Green Lake.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take a cold-brew fog latte.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Call Brew Fog Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. I would like to get some whipped cream and whole milk with honey drizzled over the top. Would be fantastic. With an extra with extra espresso, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: just 1 extra shot of espresso or more?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Two, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A large. Thank you for asking.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a large cold brew fog latte with whipped cream, whole milk, 2 extra shots of espresso and honey drizzled over the top.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that that sounds delicious. Thank you. You're lovely.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, I really appreciate it. I'm really excited, thank you so much for your help. You're the best.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your welcome, enjoy your coffee.
